title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2882/83 of 13 October 1983 on the classification of goods in heading No 97.04, subheading C of the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2882/83
of 13 October 1983
on the classification of goods in heading No 97.04, subheading C of the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 October 1983.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
